description.action: A Koopa Trooper continues his frustrated attempts to clean up the slime covering the floor and walls, baffled by its sudden appearance.
The Koopa Trooper with the eye patch also keeps working to clean the slime, equally confused by the mess.
Evan, one of the shapeshifting children, watches the Koopa Troopers' futile efforts from his hiding spot, a mischievous grin on his face.
Isaac, another of the shapeshifting children, giggles quietly as he observes the chaos he and his siblings have caused in the courtyard.
The youngest of the shapeshifting children, Aurelia, hides in the bushes, her eyes filled with wonder at the colorful butterflies fluttering all around.
